java/liquibase/servlet/LiquibaseServletListener.java

00001 package liquibase.servlet;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00004 import liquibase.*;
00005 import liquibase.util.NetUtil;
00006 import liquibase.database.DatabaseFactory;
00007 
00008 import javax.servlet.ServletContextListener;
00009 import javax.servlet.ServletContextEvent;
00010 import javax.naming.Context;
00011 import javax.naming.InitialContext;
00012 import javax.sql.DataSource;
00013 import java.util.logging.Handler;
00014 import java.util.logging.LogRecord;
00015 import java.net.InetAddress;
00016 import java.net.UnknownHostException;
00017 import java.sql.Connection;
00018 
00026 public class LiquibaseServletListener implements ServletContextListener {
00027 
00028     private String changeLogFile;
00029     private String dataSource;
00030     private String contexts;
00031 
00032 
00033     public String getChangeLogFile() {
00034         return changeLogFile;
00035     }
00036 
00037     public void setContexts(String ctxt) {
00038         contexts = ctxt;
00039     }
00040 
00041     public String getContexts() {
00042         return contexts;
00043     }
00044 
00045     public void setChangeLogFile(String changeLogFile) {
00046         this.changeLogFile = changeLogFile;
00047     }
00048 
00049     public String getDataSource() {
00050         return dataSource;
00051     }
00052 
00053     public void setDataSource(String dataSource) {
00054         this.dataSource = dataSource;
00055     }
00056 
00057     public void contextInitialized(ServletContextEvent servletContextEvent) {
00058         LogFactory.getLogger().addHandler(new Handler() {
00059             public synchronized void publish(LogRecord record) {
00060                 LiquibaseStatusServlet.logMessage(record);
00061             }
00062 
00063             public void flush() {
00064             }
00065 
00066             public void close() throws SecurityException {
00067             }
00068         });
00069         String hostName;
00070         try {
00071             hostName = NetUtil.getLocalHost().getHostName();
00072         } catch (Exception e) {
00073             servletContextEvent.getServletContext().log("Cannot find hostname: " + e.getMessage());
00074             return;
00075         }
00076 
00077         String shouldRunProperty = System.getProperty(Liquibase.SHOULD_RUN_SYSTEM_PROPERTY);
00078         if (shouldRunProperty != null && !Boolean.valueOf(shouldRunProperty)) {
00079             LogFactory.getLogger().info("LiquiBase did not run on " + hostName + " because '" + Liquibase.SHOULD_RUN_SYSTEM_PROPERTY + "' system property was set to false");
00080             return;
00081         }
00082 
00083         String machineIncludes = servletContextEvent.getServletContext().getInitParameter("LIQUIBASE_HOST_INCLUDES");
00084         String machineExcludes = servletContextEvent.getServletContext().getInitParameter("LIQUIBASE_HOST_EXCLUDES");
00085         String failOnError = servletContextEvent.getServletContext().getInitParameter("LIQUIBASE_FAIL_ON_ERROR");
00086 
00087         boolean shouldRun = false;
00088         if (machineIncludes == null && machineExcludes == null) {
00089             shouldRun = true;
00090         } else if (machineIncludes != null) {
00091             for (String machine : machineIncludes.split(",")) {
00092                 machine = machine.trim();
00093                 if (hostName.equalsIgnoreCase(machine)) {
00094                     shouldRun = true;
00095                 }
00096             }
00097         } else if (machineExcludes != null) {
00098             shouldRun = true;
00099             for (String machine : machineExcludes.split(",")) {
00100                 machine = machine.trim();
00101                 if (hostName.equalsIgnoreCase(machine)) {
00102                     shouldRun = false;
00103                 }
00104             }
00105         }
00106 
00107         if (!shouldRun) {
00108             servletContextEvent.getServletContext().log("LiquibaseServletListener did not run due to LIQUIBASE_HOST_INCLUDES and/or LIQUIBASE_HOST_EXCLUDES");
00109             return;
00110         }
00111 
00112 
00113         setDataSource(servletContextEvent.getServletContext().getInitParameter("LIQUIBASE_DATA_SOURCE"));
00114         setChangeLogFile(servletContextEvent.getServletContext().getInitParameter("LIQUIBASE_CHANGELOG"));
00115         setContexts(servletContextEvent.getServletContext().getInitParameter("LIQUIBASE_CONTEXTS"));
00116         if (getChangeLogFile() == null) {
00117             throw new RuntimeException("Cannot run LiquiBase, LIQUIBASE_CHANGELOG is not set");
00118         }
00119         if (getDataSource() == null) {
00120             throw new RuntimeException("Cannot run LiquiBase, LIQUIBASE_DATA_SOURCE is not set");
00121         }
00122 
00123         try {
00124             Context ic = null;
00125             Connection connection = null;
00126             try {
00127                 ic = new InitialContext();
00128                 DataSource dataSource = (DataSource) ic.lookup(this.dataSource);
00129 
00130                 connection = dataSource.getConnection();
00131 
00132                 FileOpener clFO = new ClassLoaderFileOpener();
00133                 FileOpener fsFO = new FileSystemFileOpener();
00134 
00135 
00136                 Liquibase liquibase = new Liquibase(getChangeLogFile(), new CompositeFileOpener(clFO,fsFO), DatabaseFactory.getInstance().findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(connection));
00137                 liquibase.update(getContexts());
00138             } finally {
00139                 if (ic != null) {
00140                     ic.close();
00141                 }
00142                 if (connection != null) {
00143                     connection.close();
00144                 }
00145             }
00146 
00147         } catch (Exception e) {
00148             if (!"false".equals(failOnError)) {
00149                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00150             }
00151         }
00152     }
00153 
00154     public void contextDestroyed(ServletContextEvent servletContextEvent) {
00155     }
00156 
00157 }
